Entries.Sorren: Is this for me? Really? Thank you, @!/730 732 205 348 212/Hey, thanks! I can definitely make use of this./169 431 550 394 715 384 386 351 404 281 257 430 139/I don't need this.../196 648 456 457/Are you just giving it to me because you don't want it?//Thanks for thinking of me./-4 378 380 78 376 422/
When I was a kid, my parents hid little plastic eggs with candies inside. These local traditions feel quaint in comparison.$h#$e#Guess that was a pretty long time ago, now that I think about it.
Hello, love. I saved you a seat if you wanna put your feet up for a bit.$4
I'm not much of a dancer.
You're the only person I wanna dance with, @.$l
It's way too hot out. Marlon has the right idea staying back here.#$e#I put some mushrooms from the mines into the soup.
Entries.Sorren_spouse: I'm not avoiding you, I promise! It's just really, really hot out and the shade is cool.$3

Entries.Sorren: The beach looks completely different at night with all these glowing lights.#$b#I'm actually really excited to see the moonlight jellies.$h
Entries.Sorren_spouse: Are you going to watch with me? The night feels so romantic.$8

Entries.Sorren: Is it terribly cheesy if I say I'd rather watch you than the jellies?$3
Robin is a whiz with wood. I've learned a lot from her.#$e#Clint is great with metal, too. I supplied some of the ore for a couple pieces on display.
Entries.Sorren_spouse: What did you bring for the grange display? I'm excited to see!$h

Entries.Sorren: Maybe one day I'll have enough little whittled figures to show some off like the others do.
Hm? Oh, no, this one isn't mine. I would have come up with something a little less... goofy.#$e#Maybe next year I'll try to make an ice sculpture.
This is my favorite festival. Do you want to make a snowman with me?$8
Thought I'd sit over here. Didn't want to get in the way of all the families.$3#$e#I'm fine on my own. Thanks for coming to say hi, though.
You've made me feel like I belong, @. You're my family. I couldn't ask for a better present than that.$l

Entries.Sorren0: Are you excited for the big day? I sure am.$4
Entries.Sorren1: I used to think I would never be happy again. I'm so glad I was wrong, @.$5

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Sorren... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you married!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Sorren... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you married!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if they'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor, on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sorren in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if they'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor, on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sorren in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.SorrenBeach: Dear @,^Would you like to go to the beach with me?^Any nice sunny day should do. Bring your swimsuit!^  -Sorren

Entries.summer_16: Hi, @. I, uh, need some time alone today.$2
The death of a loved one leaves a lifelong scar. But maybe, with time, it can fade a little.$2

Entries.247101/f Sorren 500/t 1600 2400: Of Dwarves/18 8/farmer 18 12 0 Sorren 23 9 0/skippable/playSound woodyStep/move Sorren 0 -1 0/faceDirection Sorren 3/emote Sorren 16/pause 500/move Sorren -5 0 2/speak Sorren "Evening, @. Didn't expect to bump into you here."/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Sorren "$q -1 null#Come to do some mining?#$r -1 10 doyoumine_yes#Yep!#$r -1 0 doyoumine_no#Just looking around.#$r -1 25 doyoumine_friend#I came to see you!"/pause 800/speak Sorren "Anyway, I could use a break if you don't mind keeping me company for a spell."/emote farmer 32/move Sorren -3 0 1/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Sorren "You've been pretty welcoming to me since we met, @. Thanks for that.#$b#I know I'm not exactly the chattiest person, or the friendliest...$3#$b#And I sorta hole myself up in the mountains mining all afternoon.$3#$b#It's just hard for me to open up. So it really means a lot that you make an effort."/pause 800/speak Sorren "I moved here after... someone I cared about died. I don't like to talk about it, but...$3#$b#He used to get me to come out of my shell so easily."/emote Sorren 28/speak Sorren "Sorry, that's depressing, isn't it? I should get back to work.#$b#Glad we got to shoot the breeze. See you around, @!$1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.247110/f Sorren 1000/w sunny/t 800 1600: Overcast/62 10/farmer 54 7 1 Sorren 62 10 2/skippable/animate Sorren false true 250 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/playSound shwip/pause 500/move farmer 4 0 1/playSound shwip/move farmer 0 3 1/playSound shwip/move farmer 1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 500/stopAnimation Sorren 16/pause 500/speak Sorren "@, is that you?"/move farmer 5 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Sorren 1/emote farmer 8/pause 300/speak Sorren "Oh, I'm whittling. I collect driftwood from the beach since it doesn't take long to clean up and dry by myself.$1#$b#Back in Grampleton, there was lots of good, dry wood to work with. Sometimes I miss it."/question fork1 "#You should go back there.#What did you do there?"/fork whatDo/pause 200/speak Sorren "What, do you not want me here? Geeze...$5"/pause 500/speak Sorren "I couldn't go back even if I wanted to. There's nothing left for me there.$2"/pause 200/emote Sorren 12/pause 200/speak Sorren "I've got to go. See ya.$5"/move Sorren 0 -2 0/move Sorren -12 0 3/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.whatDo: pause 200/speak Sorren "I was a lumberjack, but I sorta became disillusioned about it after a while.#$b#The logging company had us chopping down so many trees and they barely planted any in their place.#$b#It wasn't sustainable, not for us or the animals who lived in the forests.$2"/pause 500/speak Sorren "Then some other things happened, and eventually I decided to try my hand at mining.#$b#My father owned a mine, so I knew the business, I'd just never been serious about it before.#$b#So... here I am.$1"/pause 200/speak Sorren "It's not exactly sustainable either, but I'm just one guy and I'm not pushing any critters out of their habitat."/pause 800/speak Sorren "Well, I'd better not keep you too long. You've probably got plenty of work to do.#$b#Thanks for coming to see me, @.$1"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.247111/f Sorren 1500/t 2000 2400/p Gus: Saloon1/15 18/farmer 14 23 0 Sorren 18 22 2 Gus 14 18 2 Emily 17 17 0 Pam 7 18 1 Clint 19 23 3 Marnie 9 22 1 Shane 22 18 2/skippable/animate Gus false true 300 18 19 20 19 18/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 200/speak Sorren "Hey, @! Come sit over here with us!$1"/pause 200/move farmer 3 0 2/pause 200/speak Sorren "How about I buy you a drink?$1"/question fork1 "#Beer, please.#Coffee, please."/fork haveCoffee/animate Shane false false 250 20 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 20/pause 100/move Sorren 0 -1 0/move Sorren -4 0 3/move Sorren 0 -1 0/pause 100/speak Sorren "Hey Gus, can I get a Beer, please?"/pause 200/speak Gus "Sure thing, Sorren.$h"/stopAnimation Gus 18/showFrame Gus 0/playSound Milking/pause 1200/move Emily -2 0 0/playSound purchaseClick/pause 500/speak Sorren "Thanks, Gus.$1"/move Sorren 0 1 2/move Sorren 4 0 1/move Sorren 0 1 2/animate Gus false true 300 18 19 20 19 18/emote farmer 32/pause 200/farmerEat 346/pause 1500/move Emily 2 0 0/speak Sorren "Nothing like a cold drink after a long day, am I right?$1"/pause 800/speak Clint "You sure are in a good mood tonight, Sorren.$1"/pause 200/speak Sorren "Yeah, I guess I am.#$b#I'm finally starting to feel like I'm a part of Stardew Valley, you know?$1#$b#You're my friend, Clint, and so is Gus, and I go fishing with Willy sometimes. Even Linus is warming up to me.$1#$b#And you, @... You've been really nice to me.$4"/animate Shane false false 250 20 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 20/pause 800/speak Clint "I didn't have many friends before you came to town, either. I'm glad you did."/pause 200/speak Sorren "Well, shucks. And with me being such a grump sometimes.$3#$b#$q -1 null#Why do you two put up with me, anyway?#$r -1 10 whyfriends_interesting#You're interesting.#$r -1 10 whyfriends_cute#You're cute.#$r -1 0 whyfriends_idk#I don't know, actually."/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 500/speak Sorren "When I first moved here, I felt like everyone already knew each other so well that I'd never fit in.#$b#Not to mention, I didn't really want to get to know anyone. I kinda wanted to disappear, actually.$2#$b#But then you two talked to me and spent time with me, and little by little, everything looked a bit brighter.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 400/speak Clint "Until you tried my Algae Soup.$1"/speak Sorren "Haha, yeah! That stuff is awful.$1#"/pause 500/move Emily 2 0 0/speak Sorren "Say, are you two still thirsty?#$b#Let's have one more round of drinks, on me!$8"/animate Shane false false 250 20 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.haveCoffee: animate Shane false false 250 20 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 20/pause 200/move Sorren 0 -1 0/move Sorren -4 0 3/move Sorren 0 -1 0/pause 100/speak Sorren "Hey Gus, can I get a Coffee, please?"/pause 200/speak Gus "Sure thing, Sorren.$h"/stopAnimation Gus 18/showFrame Gus 0/playSound Milking/pause 1200/move Emily -2 0 0/playSound purchaseClick/pause 500/speak Sorren "Thanks, Gus.$1"/move Sorren 0 1 2/move Sorren 4 0 1/move Sorren 0 1 2/animate Gus false true 300 18 19 20 19 18/emote farmer 32/pause 200/farmerEat 395/pause 1500/move Emily 2 0 0/speak Sorren "Nothing like a warm drink after a long day, am I right?$1"/pause 800/speak Clint "You sure are in a good mood tonight, Sorren.$1"/pause 200/speak Sorren "Yeah, I guess I am.#$b#I'm finally starting to feel like I'm a part of Stardew Valley, you know?$1#$b#You're my friend, Clint, and so is Gus, and I go fishing with Willy sometimes. Even Linus is warming up to me.$1#$b#And you, @... You've been really nice to me.$4"/animate Shane false false 250 20 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 20/pause 800/speak Clint "I didn't have many friends before you came to town, either. I'm glad you did."/pause 200/speak Sorren "Well, shucks. And with me being such a grump sometimes.$3#$b#$q -1 null#Why do you two put up with me, anyway?#$r -1 10 whyfriends_interesting#You're interesting.#$r -1 10 whyfriends_cute#You're cute.#$r -1 0 whyfriends_idk#I don't know, actually."/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 500/speak Sorren "When I first moved here, I felt like everyone already knew each other so well that I'd never fit in.#$b#Not to mention, I didn't really want to get to know anyone. I kinda wanted to disappear, actually.$2#$b#But then you two talked to me and spent time with me, and little by little, everything looked a bit brighter.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 400/speak Clint "Until you tried my Algae Soup.$1"/speak Sorren "Haha, yeah! That stuff is awful.$1#"/pause 500/move Emily 2 0 0/speak Sorren "Say, are you two still thirsty?#$b#Let's have one more round of drinks, on me!$8"/animate Shane false false 250 20 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.247112/f Sorren 2000/w sunny/t 610 1500: Icicles/57 34/farmer 39 33 1 Sorren 57 34 1/skippable/move farmer 8 0 1/pause 500/speak Sorren "*sniffle* Ugh, I'm such a mess...$6"/jump farmer/pause 500/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 1 0/move farmer 7 0 1/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Sorren 3/pause 200/speak Sorren "@!$7#$b#What? No, I... I'm fine..."/pause 1500/speak Sorren "I can't get anything past you, can I? Might as well tell you...$3"/playMusic desolate/faceDirection Sorren 1/speed farmer 3/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sorren "You know how I told you someone close to me died a while back?#$b#His name was Theo. We were in love, and we were together for a long time.$2#$b#One day, he got into a car accident.$2#$b#I got a call from the hospital. It was all so sudden...$2"/pause 2000/speak Sorren "When he died, I... I didn't know what to do with myself. Nothing felt right anymore.$2#$b#Everything reminded me of him: our house, places we used to visit, things we used to do together.$2#$b#Eventually, I decided I had to leave. That's why I decided to start over here in Stardew Valley."/pause 2000/speak Sorren "But I... I didn't count on getting close to anybody here. It scares me.$3"/pause 800/faceDirection Sorren 3/pause 1000/speak Sorren "What if someone dies or leaves or... What if you die, @?$6#$b#$q -1 null#I don't want to feel that kind of pain ever again.#$r -1 0 hurt_nodie#I'm not going to die.#$r -1 15 hurt_worthit#You have to make the pain worth it by living life to the fullest.#$r -1 0 hurt_suckitup#Everyone dies. Better get used to it."/pause 2000/speak Sorren "All I can do is keep going, and hopefully do more of what makes me and other people happy.#$b#Then maybe, just maybe, the good will end up outweighing the bad.#$b#As much as it hurts, I was happy before. I want to be happy again."/pause 2500/speak Sorren "Well, now I've gone and been all sappy in front of you.$3"/pause 500/speak Sorren "Thanks for listening, though. It was good to get that off my chest.#$b#That's what friends are for, right? Helping to make the day a little easier.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 800/move Sorren -1 0 3/pause 500/speak Sorren "If you ever need anything, @, you just let me know, okay?#$b#You can lean on me."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.247113/f Sorren 2500/w sunny/t 700 1400/: Cloth/51 24/farmer 52 23 2 Sorren 42 15 2/skippable/emote farmer 8/changeSprite Sorren Swimtrunks/pause 500/move Sorren 0 7 2/move Sorren 5 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 200/speak Sorren "Hey, @! I'm glad you came!$10#$b#Have you been waiting long? I had to put on my swim trunks.$9"/pause 800/speak Sorren "I, um... I have something to tell you...$11"/pause 500/move Sorren 2 0 1/pause 1500/speak Sorren "I don't know how to swim.$14"/pause 500/speak Sorren "So uh, I was wondering... if you would teach me?$14"/question fork1 "#Sure!#I can't swim either."/fork noTeach/pause 200/speak Sorren "Oh, good!$13#$b#I was a little worried about telling you.$12#$b#People make fun of you for not knowing how to do stuff like that at my age.$11#$b#But I'm glad you didn't.$10"/pause 500/faceDirection Sorren 2/pause 200/speak Sorren "Okay, so I guess we should get in the water first.$9"/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/viewport move 0 1 2000/move Sorren 0 3 2/move farmer -2 0 3/move farmer 0 2 2/swimming Sorren/move Sorren 0 2 0/swimming farmer/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Sorren "S-So I just make my hands like paddles to push back the water?$9#$b#And then I sweep my arms back and kick my legs...$11"/pause 200/playSound waterSlosh/speed Sorren 1/move Sorren -1 0 3/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Sorren "Agh! *garble* *cough*$15"/playSound waterSlosh/shake Sorren 400/pause 800/speak Sorren "I got it, I'm fine!$10"/pause 400/playSound waterSlosh/speed Sorren 2/move Sorren 2 0 1/pause 800/speak Sorren "Phew, I think I'm getting the hang of it!$12"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/playSound waterSlosh/speed Sorren 2/move Sorren 0 2 2/playSound waterSlosh/move Sorren -2 0 3/playSound waterSlosh/move Sorren 0 -1 1/pause 500/speak Sorren "Woohoo! I'm swimming!$13"/pause 200/speed Sorren 5/move Sorren 0 2 2/pause 200/speed Sorren 5/move Sorren 4 0 1/pause 200/speed Sorren 5/move Sorren -4 0 3/pause 200/speed Sorren 5/move Sorren 2 0 2/playSound dwop/showFrame Sorren 16/jump Sorren/pause 400/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Sorren "Gack!$15"/shake Sorren 2000/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 100/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 4/move farmer -1 0 2/pause 200/speed farmer 4/move farmer 2 0 2/pause 200/showFrame Sorren 0/faceDirection Sorren 0/pause 100/speak Sorren "*cough* I-I'm okay!$11"/pause 200/speed Sorren 2/move Sorren 0 -3 0/pause 500/speak Sorren "Guess I should keep to the shallows until I practice some more.$12"/pause 400/move Sorren -1 0 3/move Sorren 0 -2 0/jump Sorren/stopSwimming Sorren/move Sorren 0 -2 2/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 0/jump farmer/stopSwimming farmer/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Sorren 1/playMusic moonlightJellies/pause 500/speak Sorren "Thanks for teaching me, @.$13"/pause 800/speak Sorren "Seriously, I really appreciate it.$12"/pause 1000/speak Sorren "And I really, um... What I mean to say is...$11"/pause 1000/speak Sorren "You make me feel like I can do anything.$11#$b#I would've never learned to swim if not for you.$12#$b#And, well, I want to do better, be better... for you.$11"/pause 800/speak Sorren "D-Do you feel the same way?$11"/pause 500/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 200/speak Sorren "Are you cold? Oh!$11"/pause 100/showFrame farmer 101/showFrame Sorren 17/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset Sorren 2 0/pause 50/pause 700/playSound dwop/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.noTeach: pause 500/speak Sorren "Wait, really? You're not pulling my leg?$11"/pause 1500/speak Sorren "Hahaha!$13#$b#Here I was getting all embarrassed about it, and you can't either!$13#$b#Well, that certainly makes me feel better.$12"/pause 300/faceDirection Sorren 2/pause 600/speak Sorren "Kind of a waste to have a swim suit on and not get our feet wet, though.$10"/faceDirection Sorren 1/pause 400/speak Sorren "Wanna take a long walk on the beach with me?$12"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 600/viewport move 1 2 5000/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
